edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace
Interface GlobalWorkspace

All Known Implementing Classes:
GlobalWorkspaceImpl
public interface GlobalWorkspace

Interface for GlobalWorkspace. It receives Coalitions generated by Attention Codelets from Workspace It stores them until a new broadcast is triggered Different Triggers can be registered dynamically Modules that receive broadcast must register implementing BroadcastListener interface

Author:
Javier Snaider

start

void start()
This method starts GlobalWorkspace mechanism. It should be called after registered Triggers and BroadcastListeners.
